meaningMnemonic: You offer <radical>flowers</radical> to your <radical>leader</radical> and compliment them on their <radical>lip ring</radical>. You think that by doing this they might carry your <kanji>luggage</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Unconvinced by your flattery, the leader refuses to carry your <kanji>luggage</kanji>, so you get on your <reading>knee</reading>s (に) and beg them to carry it.
